reviewText: If you want to know what happened on site and when, get this video!  Well done overview of problems, and response (sometimes lack of response) by the Fukushima Nuclear Plant and TEPCO. Highly recommended.

As someone with a long term stake in JP ... watching this was scary as it poses more questions than answers. The TEPCO employee and Prime Minister interviews were surprisingly candid. This was filmed in February 2011 so it's outdated and doesnt mention the new children's thyroid cancer cases.
